# menuItemTitle

**Instance Property**

The title of the service in the Share menu.

## Declaration

```swift
var menuItemTitle: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, this title is the same as the value of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSharingService/title] property. Your app can modify this value.

## Configuring the Service

- **recipients**: An array containing the user handles of the desired recipients.
- **subject**: The subject of the post.

items.description: An array containing the user handles of the desired recipients.
items.name: recipients

title: menuItemTitle
